name: Red Escape
description:
Help our Hero to escape the dread red dungeon! Be fast, be accurate and finish the foes in this 2D Platform Game specially designed for Ludumdare#45! Find new skills and different ways of observing challenges as you go through the empty dungeon.

Start with nothing, end with your salvation!

Controls:

  • Use the Arrow Keys for moving and jumping;
  • Use the Z key for punching

Made for LudumDare#45

Credits: 
Welliton Souza: Programmer, Game Designer and Artist 
Clovis Villela: Composer and Sound Designer
